contentrichtext.text: '''Yuvan Nikolayevich Shestalov''' ({{lang-ru|Юван Николаевич Шесталов}}; born 22 June 1937 in Kamratka village, [[Beryozovsky District, Khanty-Mansi Autonomous Okrug]], died 5 November 2011) was a [[Mansi people|Mansi]] writer from [[Russia]], arguably the best known author in the [[Mansi language]] (although he mostly wrote in [[Russian language|Russian]]). His work in Mansi has been widely translated and he worked actively to preserve the language and its culture.{{citation needed|date=November 2011}} == External links == * [http://www.ugrasu.ru/news/belyiy-sterh--uletel-no-ostavil-nam-pesnyu-/ Obituary] {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Shestalov | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Russian writer | DATE OF BIRTH = 22 June 1937 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = 5 November 2011 | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Shestalov}} [[Category:1937 births]] [[Category:2011 deaths]] [[Category:Mansi people]] [[Category:Russian writers]] [[Category:Soviet writers]] {{russia-writer-stub}}
